definition: something that bulges out or is protuberant or projects from its surroundings, to cause to bulge or swell outwards
details:
noun
- something that bulges out or is protuberant or projects from its surroundings
= example: something that bulges out or is protuberant or projects from its surroundings
= synonyms: extrusion
verb
- to cause to bulge or swell outwards
= example: to cause to bulge or swell outwards
= synonyms: bulk
- to swell or protrude outwards
= example: to swell or protrude outwards
= synonyms: pouch
- to swell outward
= example: to swell outward
= synonyms: start
- to swell out
= example: to swell out
= synonyms: bag
